ProxyResourceWithTags.description: Common fields that are returned in the response for all Azure Resource Manager resources.

tags.description: Dictionary of metadata associated with the resource. It may not be populated for all resource types. Maximum key/value length supported of 256 characters. Keys/value should not empty value nor null. Keys can not contain < > % & \ ? /

currency.description: The currency for the amount value.

value.description: The amount value. For example, if the currency is USD, then a value of 600 would be $600.00.

companyName.description: Company name. Optional for MCA Individual (Pay-as-you-go).

country.description: Country code uses ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 format.

firstName.description: First name. Optional for MCA Enterprise.

lastName.description: Last name. Optional for MCA Enterprise.

isValidAddress.description: Indicates if the address is incomplete.

productId.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a product.

skuId.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a sku.

IndirectRelationshipInfo.description: Identifies the billing profile that is linked to another billing profile in indirect purchase motion.

billingAccountName.description: The billing account name of the partner or the customer for an indirect motion.

billingProfileName.description: The billing profile name of the partner or the customer for an indirect motion.

displayName.description: The display name of the partner or customer for an indirect motion.

PatchResource.description: Common fields that are in the patch method request body of all Azure Resource Manager patch resources.

resellerId.description: The MPN ID of the reseller.

billingAccountName.name: billingAccountName
billingAccountName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a billing account.

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2024-04-01.

associatedTenantName.name: associatedTenantName
associatedTenantName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a tenant.

filter.name: filter
filter.description: The filter query option allows clients to filter a collection of resources that are addressed by a request URL.

orderBy.name: orderBy
orderBy.description: The orderby query option allows clients to request resources in a particular order.

top.name: top
top.description: The top query option requests the number of items in the queried collection to be included in the result. The maximum supported value for top is 50.

skip.name: skip
skip.description: The skip query option requests the number of items in the queried collection that are to be skipped and not included in the result.

count.name: count
count.description: The count query option allows clients to request a count of the matching resources included with the resources in the response.

search.name: search
search.description: The search query option allows clients to request items within a collection matching a free-text search expression. search is only supported for string fields.

billingProfileName.name: billingProfileName
billingProfileName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a billing profile.

customerName.name: customerName
customerName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a customer.

invoiceSectionName.name: invoiceSectionName
invoiceSectionName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies an invoice section.

enrollmentAccountName.name: enrollmentAccountName
enrollmentAccountName.description: The name of the enrollment account.

subscriptionId.name: subscriptionId
subscriptionId.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a billing subscription.

billingRequestName.name: billingRequestName
billingRequestName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a billing request.

billingRoleAssignmentName.name: billingRoleAssignmentName
billingRoleAssignmentName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a role assignment.

roleDefinitionName.name: roleDefinitionName
roleDefinitionName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a role definition.

invoiceName.name: invoiceName
invoiceName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies an invoice.

productName.name: productName
productName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a product.
